about.summary: Collection of functions to improve work-flow in survival analysis and data science. The package features include: the generation of balanced datasets, live retrieval of  protein coding genes from two public databases, generation of random  matrix based on covariance matrix, cache function to store function results. This work was supported by two grants from the Portuguese Foundation for Science and technology, and the EU Commission under SOUND project.

name: r-loose.rock
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.16' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-loose.rock
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/loose.rock_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/loose.rock/loose.rock_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f514ef645ca73797bd6cb02eb5d3e6614beed13eb7ec93460b0c8ce363fd696e

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-digest
    - r-dplyr
    - r-futile.options
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-reshape2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-digest
    - r-dplyr
    - r-futile.options
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-reshape2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('loose.rock')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('loose.rock')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.github.com/averissimo/loose.rock
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: 'Collection of functions to improve work-flow in survival analysis and data science.
    The package features include: the generation of balanced datasets, live retrieval
    of  protein coding genes from two public databases, generation of random  matrix
    based on covariance matrix, cache function to store function results. This work
    was supported by two grants from the Portuguese Foundation for Science and technology,
    and the EU Commission under SOUND project.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: loose.rock
# Title: Tools for Survival Analysis and Data Science
# Version: 1.0.16
# Authors@R: c(person("Andre", "Verissimo", email = "andre.verissimo@tecnico.ulisboa.pt", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Susana", "Vinga", email = "susanavinga@tecnico.ulisboa.pt", role = "aut"))
# Description: Collection of functions to improve work-flow in survival analysis and data science. The package features include: the generation of balanced datasets, live retrieval of  protein coding genes from two public databases, generation of random  matrix based on covariance matrix, cache function to store function results. This work was supported by two grants from the Portuguese Foundation for Science and technology, and the EU Commission under SOUND project.
# Depends: R (>= 3.4)
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: no
# NeedsCompilation: no
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Imports: digest, futile.options, ggplot2, graphics, MASS, methods, dplyr, reshape2
# Suggests: biomaRt, knitr, rmarkdown, devtools, roxygen2, testthat, survival
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# BugReports: https://www.github.com/averissimo/loose.rock/issues
# URL: https://www.github.com/averissimo/loose.rock
# Packaged: 2019-05-31 13:21:36 UTC; averissimo
# Author: Andre Verissimo [aut, cre], Susana Vinga [aut]
# Maintainer: Andre Verissimo <andre.verissimo@tecnico.ulisboa.pt>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-31 14:10:02 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
